name: What Was Left Behind
author: Keith
description: An experimental art installation featuring dressed mannequins, the liminal veil, and a story told without words for those who look deeper.

name: Portraits of a Star
author: Jonathan Wang
description: A grid of paintings featuring original character Asteryski, with a four-pointed star forming across the paintings.

name: 2048 AI
author: Angela Qian
description: A neural network trained off human games to play 2048. It was displayed as a retro-style interactive exhibit using a CRT monitor and an old school joystick, where visitors could actively "sabotage" the game and watch the bot attempt to recover.

name: Beacons
author: Jack Hogan
description: Social devices to make warm introductions and bring the party to you.

name: Qter Robot
author: Arhan Chaudhary & Henry Rovnyak
description: A computer architecture that allows humans to perform computations by manipulating the Rubik's Cube by hand with a robot to do the hard work for you.

name: The Sign
author: Jack Hogan
description: A meter-tall Conway glider that lights up according to a color representation of the current time.
